117312.「ここから 東に行くと\n オアシスの隊商宿っちゅう\n 集落に 行き着くたい。:
If you go east from here, you will reach the settlement of Oasis Caravan. If you go southwest to Goble Desert
West, you will reach a settlement called merchants' tents. If you haven't been there yet, you should go
there.

52994.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「ここから西の:
I heard that there is an Armorsmith Guild in Dolworm Kingdom, which is located to the west of here. I would
like to visit there, but I don't have the courage to do so.

71720.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「あら……あなた:
Oh, you. Hmm. You're still a gem in the rough right now, but if you work on your sense of style, you'll shine
beautifully, won't you? Oh, that's right, Salon Salon Fe Lycia is getting ready to open all over the place, and
I, the charismatic hair stylist, got an offer. If you want to be as beautiful as me, why don't you go
there? The salon is just down the road in Dolworm Kingdom.

71721.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「悪いけど アタ:
Sorry, but I'm off today. Now I'm not with a charismatic hairdresser and her clients, but a beautiful celebrity and
a wayward traveler. Well, you seem to be pretty good at it. I just wanted to try out an idea I had on vacation. I
need you to run an errand for me. Bring me some of that Golden Oil that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> monster sometimes
drops to make a new celebrity color for the salon.

71722.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ま 当然の選択:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Well, it's an obvious choice.
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> is running in the
desert around here. Nice to meet you.

71723.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「賢明な選択ね:
I'd say that's a wise choice, but you have your hands full with other things you need to do. Why don't you finish
that and come back later?

71724.<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>「……あら ご不:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>Oh, you're not satisfied? Oh, yeah.
I'm tired of working on my day off,
and in a way, I appreciate you.

71725.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「美容院で使える:
I can make the most celebrity new color <%sev_que_name0> for Salon with Golden Oil that monster sometimes
drops.

71726.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「<%sEV_Q:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr><%sEV_QUE_NAME0> is just running
around here in Goble Desert East. So
it's nice to meet you. Hmmm.

71727.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「あら……早かっ:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Well, you're early. You got Golden
Oil. Can I see it?

71728.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「なあに？ まだ:
What is it? You haven't found it yet? You're such a good kitty, aren't you? Normally, I'd say ''Meh. But since I'm
off duty today, I'll let you off the hook. Just take it easy and do your best.

71729.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ン～ いい香り:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>What a nice aroma. Then, give me your
hand. Here. Wet it on my back.

71730.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「いい手つきね。:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>You have good hands. You're very
talented. Oh, that feels good.

71731.「おつかれさま。アタシ どうしても\n この こんじきオイルが 必要だったのよ。:
Good night. I really needed this Golden Oil. Tanning is a must on vacation. Then, as promised, I'll use
the rest of the Golden Oil to make a new color.

71732.「まずは こんじきオイルを 温めて……\n フフ 太陽みたいな 美しい金色ね。\:
First, warm up the Golden Oil, it's a
beautiful golden color like the sun.
Then I'll let my magic do the rest.<bw_break>

71733.「マジカル マジカル……アブラ カタブラ\n ビビデ・ビジョデ・ショー！:
Magical Magical Abra Katabra Bibide,

71734.「ふぅん……いい色が できたじゃない。\n セレブの休日にふさわしい この新色…:

71735.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「……あ そうそ:

71736.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「この サンゴー:
This sungold color should work anywhere in Salon. You can try it out right away. I think that charismatic
hairdresser Bibide from Salon Fe Lycia might respect me? I worked even though it was my day off. I guess I'm a born
beauty seeker after all. Hmmm.

71737.ビビデに\nこんじきオイルを 渡しますか？<yesno><case 1><bre: Would you give Bibide the Golden Oil?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

71742.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「知ってる？ <:
